code: import React from"react";import{Pie}from"react-chartjs-2";import"../styles/Budget.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BudgetChart(_ref){var newIncome=_ref.newIncome,newNeeds=_ref.newNeeds,newWants=_ref.newWants,newFinancialGoals=_ref.newFinancialGoals;var state={labels:["Needs","Wants","Financial Goals"],datasets:[{label:"# of votes",data:[newIncome*(newNeeds/100),newIncome*(newWants/100),newIncome*(newFinancialGoals/100)],backgroundColor:["#2adece","#dd3b79","#ff766b"],borderWidth:1,cx:400,cy:400}]};var options={responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,plugins:{legend:{display:true,position:"bottom",align:"center",boxWidth:800,boxHeight:600},title:{text:"Budget Pie Chart",display:false,fontSize:100}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{className:"pie",data:state,options:options,cx:400,cy:400});}export default BudgetChart;
